Step.name: 'No Secrets'
Step.html: Guidance on Adult Protection issued by Department of Health under Section 7 of the Local Government Act 1970, March 2000. This gave local authorities the lead role in the work of Safeguarding Adults.

Step.name: 'Safeguarding Adults'
Step.html: Published by Association of Directors of Social Services (now ADASS) 2005. A national framework of 11 Standards for good practice and outcomes.

Step.name: 'Mental Capacity Act'
Step.html: This set up a new independent mental capacity advocate service, and set out the principles and methods for assessing the capacity to make decisions.

Step.name: 'DoLS'
Step.html: The Deprivation of Liberty Safeguards is an important new protection for people in hospitals and care homes who may need to be deprived of their liberty in order to protect them from serious harm.

Step.name: 'Wilful Neglect'
Step.html: The new offence will apply to anyone caring for a person who lacks capacity to make decisions for themselves, including family carers, healthcare and social care staff in hospital or care homes and those providing care in a persons home.
